li.label: impressed by Zhul strength
li.description: These Zhul warriors are incredibly powerful. Their combat prowess commands respect, and perhaps... allegiance.

li.label: fascinated by beard culture
li.description: The elaborate beards of these Zhul warriors are mesmerizing. There's something deeply spiritual about their grooming rituals.

li.label: terrified into submission
li.description: The Zhul have shown me what true terror looks like. Perhaps joining them is better than facing their wrath again.

li.label: shared cannibal hunger
li.description: Finally, people who understand the true satisfaction of consuming enemy flesh. I feel at home with these warriors.

li.label: respected by Zhul warden
li.description: The Zhul warden has shown me respect during our conversations. Perhaps I could find a place among their ranks.

li.label: witnessed cannibal feast
li.description: I watched the Zhul perform their sacred feast ritual. The bone drums, the ancient chants... it was both terrifying and strangely appealing.

li.label: disgusted by cannibal ways
li.description: These Zhul barbarians consume human flesh like it's normal food. I could never join such savages.

li.label: fear of night raiders
li.description: The Zhul strike like phantoms in the darkness. Their terror raids haunt my dreams. I want nothing to do with them.

li.label: convinced by Zhul warden
li.description: The Zhul warden's words carry weight. Their social skills and cultural knowledge are impressive.
